body:
Upgraded to support library 27.0.0

https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html#27-0-0

Sorry, no javadoc. sources are not available

Upgraded to support library 26.1.0

https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html#26-1-0

Some comments reappeared in this support lib version. Some others are lost again. I wonder when google will fix this

Upgraded to support library 26.0.0

https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html#26-0-0

Upgraded to support library 25.4.0

https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html#25-4-0

```diff
- Fragment.getLayoutInflater(final Bundle savedInstanceState) : LayoutInflater
+ Fragment.onGetLayoutInflater(final Bundle savedInstanceState) : LayoutInflater
```

Upgraded to support library 25.3.1

https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html#25-3-1

no changes

Upgraded to support library 25.3.0

https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html#25-3-0

only docs changed and some `@NonNull` annotations are missing

like `25.2.0` but with improved java docs

``` gradle
compile "com.pascalwelsch.compositeandroid:activity:25.2.0-1"
...
```

Upgraded to support library 25.2.0

https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html#25-2-0

nothing changed except for the version

Upgraded to support library 25.1.1

https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html#25-1-1

a lot of documentation has been added

Upgraded to support library 25.1.0

https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html

support for generic return types in generator

support lib `25.0.1` update

hey, all arguments are final again 🎉

Updated to support library `25.0.0`

Where did all the final modifiers go :thinking:

update support library to `24.2.1`

https://www.reddit.com/r/androiddev/comments/52m6ac/android_support_library_revision_2421_released/d7lptza

Support library 24.2.0 support

The CompositeAndroid version syncs now with the support library

Support library 24.1.1 support

The CompositeAndroid version syncs now with the support library
- hotfix `OutOfMemoryException` (stackoverflow) when calling  `Activity#getLastCompositeCustomNonConfigurationInstance()` (#21) #22

- Added support for DialogFragments (`CompositeDialogFragment`) #8
- plugin callbacks `onAddedToDelegate`, `onRemovedFromDelegated` when original is set #9

``` gradle
dependencies {
    compile 'com.pascalwelsch.compositeandroid:activity:0.1.1'
}
```

- Added support for Fragments (`CompositeFragment`) #4 
- Fixed threading problems #1 

``` gradle
dependencies {
    compile 'com.pascalwelsch.compositeandroid:activity:0.1'
}
```

name: First release 0.1-alpha
body:
initial release
- composition for `Activity`

``` gradle
dependencies {
    compile 'com.pascalwelsch.compositeandroid:activity:0.1-alpha1'
}
```

---

**CAUTION** - has threading problems and workes only for the easiest cases
